'''Qiankun Mora Meat''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Mora Meat]] with [[Ningguang]]. The [[recipe]] for Mora Meat is obtainable from [[Mt. Aocang]] during the [[Custodian of Clouds]] quest.<!--Needs confirmation: as well as by scavenging; found one in Mingyun Village-->

Qiankun Mora Meat revives a character and restores '''10'''% of Max HP, then restores an additional '''150''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* {{Mail Attachments by Category List}}
* {{Lang|Qiankun|zh={{wt|乾坤||Chinese}}|zh_rm=Qiánkūn}} can also be translated as "Heaven and Earth" or "universe."
* Its old name "Caelum Terra" can also mean "Heaven and Earth" in Latin.
